name: Golf_
description:
Controls:

Left/Right: Turn the arrow left/right

Click to the left/right of the ball: Turn the arrow left/right

Space: Hit the ball

Gameplay:

You want to get the least amount of points

Your strokes - par = score

Rough (Dark green) makes you go slow, bunker (tan) makes you go even slower, and water (blue) makes you restart the hole

The black bar moving along the colorful bar determines your strength: Green is more and red is less

There are 9 holes

Credits:

me - literally everything

sounds made with https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
